comments.comments_text: A corner kick by Newcastle is thwarted by the well prepared Kasper Schmeichel (Leicester).
comments.comments_text_anonymized: A corner kick by [TEAM] is thwarted by the well prepared [PLAYER] ([TEAM]).

comments.comments_text: Goal! A mistake from the defence gifted a chance to a lurking Joseph Willock (Newcastle Utd), who keeps his cool and rolls the ball into the net from close range. 0:1.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Goal! A mistake from the defence gifted a chance to a lurking Joseph [PLAYER] ([TEAM]), who keeps his cool and rolls the ball into the net from close range. 0:1.

comments.comments_text: Leicester force a corner. Their opponents will face another attacking threat.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [TEAM] force a corner. Their opponents will face another attacking threat.

comments.comments_text: Jonjo Shelvey (Newcastle Utd) takes the corner which is cleared.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) takes the corner which is cleared.

comments.comments_text: Matt Ritchie (Newcastle Utd) looks like he will be the one to try and deliver a quality ball into the penalty box from the corner kick.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) looks like he will be the one to try and deliver a quality ball into the penalty box from the corner kick.

comments.comments_text: Paul Dummett (Newcastle Utd) jumped highest inside the box to meet a perfectly executed corner kick by Matt Ritchie. His bullet header went towards the middle of the goal and behind the goalkeeper. It's 0:2.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) jumped highest inside the box to meet a perfectly executed corner kick by [PLAYER]. His bullet header went towards the middle of the goal and behind the goalkeeper. It's 0:2.

comments.comments_text: There's an opportunity for Youri Tielemans (Leicester) to deliver the ball into the box from a corner.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: There's an opportunity for [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) to deliver the ball into the box from a corner.

comments.comments_text: Joseph Willock (Newcastle Utd) whips a promising cross into the box, but the opposition's defence intercepts the ball. Newcastle have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Joseph [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) whips a promising cross into the box, but the opposition's defence intercepts the ball. [TEAM] have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.

comments.comments_text: Matt Ritchie (Newcastle Utd) launches a powerful cross from the corner into the box, but the ball is intercepted by the defender.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) launches a powerful cross from the corner into the box, but the ball is intercepted by the defender.

comments.comments_text: Newcastle failed to take advantage of the corner as the opposition's defence was alert and averted the threat.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [TEAM] failed to take advantage of the corner as the opposition's defence was alert and averted the threat.

comments.comments_text: The referee points to the corner flag. It's a corner to Leicester.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The referee points to the corner flag. It's a corner to [TEAM].

comments.comments_text: Emil Krafth (Newcastle Utd) shouldn't be surprised it's a yellow from the ref, who cooled the situation down well.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) shouldn't be surprised it's a yellow from the ref, who cooled the situation down well.

comments.comments_text: It looks like Wilfred Ndidi (Leicester) saw red with that tackle. Darren England won't tolerate such behaviour on the pitch and blows for a foul.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: It looks like [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) saw red with that tackle. [REFEREE] won't tolerate such behaviour on the pitch and blows for a foul.

comments.comments_text: The referee signals that it is time for a substitution and Ayoze Perez (Leicester) comes onto the pitch so that Wilfred Ndidi can be given a rest.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The referee signals that it is time for a substitution and [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) comes onto the pitch so that [PLAYER] can be given a rest.

comments.comments_text: Goal! The ball breaks to Callum Wilson (Newcastle Utd) after some poor defending, he finds himself one-on-one with the goalkeeper and calmly puts the ball into the back of the net! He makes it 0:3.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Goal! The ball breaks to [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) after some poor defending, he finds himself one-on-one with the goalkeeper and calmly puts the ball into the back of the net! He makes it 0:3.

comments.comments_text: The ball goes out of play and Leicester have been awarded a corner kick.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The ball goes out of play and [TEAM] have been awarded a corner kick.

comments.comments_text: Brendan Rodgers has decided to substitute Ricardo Pereira and he is replaced by Luke Thomas (Leicester).
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] has decided to substitute [PLAYER] and he is replaced by [PLAYER] ([TEAM]).

comments.comments_text: The game is interrupted. Kelechi Iheanacho (Leicester) is given a yellow card. He has to be more careful now.

comments.comments_text: Goal! The rebound fell to Callum Wilson (Newcastle Utd) and he fired home from close range. The score is 0:4.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Marc Albrighton (Leicester) finds himself some space inside the box to get on the end of a pass from Jamie Vardy, then sends the ball into the top right corner. 1:4.

comments.comments_text: Ayoze Perez (Leicester) crosses into the box from near the side line, but he doesn't connect as he wanted and it's cleared by the well-organized defence. The referee and one of his assistants signal for a corner kick to Leicester.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Kelechi Iheanacho (Leicester) weaves his way past opponents, and he unleashes a magnificent effort from the edge of the box into the bottom right corner. Martin Dubravka had no chance of reaching it. The score is 2:4.
